item.title: font_rendering
item.description: It is easy to get used to bad font rendering. But there are some simple steps one can take to get great looking fonts on *GNU/*Linux. Below is a summary of an article on binarytides, with some spice. download the following fonts from http://www.google.com/fonts/ Droid Sans Droid Sans Mono Droid Serif Noto Sans Noto Serif Open Sans Unzip ‘em and place them in ~/.fonts Download and place this .
